action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
﻿
Hi Heath

Did you get my message below?

It looks like the page titles on the header menu have doubled up and pushed the rest onto another line.. which also drops the flags and search function..

See below highlighted in red, as these are the same page titles.






Yesterday I was investigating how we could change the attached ‘author’ element for the Japanese site... so maybe I pressed something I shouldn’t have?
I didn’t actually save anything, I was purely looking around as I couldn’t see how we would update this to Japanese.
Let me know if this helps solve the problem? And if you could let me know how we could change the text for the Japanese author box below?



Thanks Heath!!


Una Mapes
